Condition_summary_1: The work must be completed by the expiration date or DFO must be notified for extension.
Condition_summary_2: Implement sediment and erosion control measures, including approved plans and monitoring turbidity levels.
Condition_summary_3: Monitor and report on mitigation measures and submit reports by specified dates.
Condition_summary_4: Offset habitat loss by placing course rock substrate and adhere to contingency plans.
Habitat_Type: Intertidal marine habitat, Subtidal marine habitat, Intertidal unnamed stream
Fish_species: None explicitly listed in the provided sections
Boulder: Course rock substrate placement as part of offset measures
